English: a, an, the (singular noun phrase marker)
Constraints: Set class:det; Add:nu (we model this as ‘un’ reversed, inspired by Glosa’s ‘u, un’, but with the same CV form used before all words for simplicity and better reading flow)

Sense: generic we (the speaker and at least one other person, regardless of whether it's the person being addressed) | objective case of "we"
